item: Exterior doors
comments: Possibly locked to prevent unwanted entry during test. Ensure emergency exit point available

item: Interior doors
comments: Open, but secured to prevent slamming

item: Keyholes
comments: No action. Can leave key in place

item: Cellar door to an unheated basement / basement corridor / staircase
comments: Doors open, if rooms heated, other wise closed

item: Flaps / doors / hatches to unheated building areas (garage, storage rooms)
comments: Possibly locked to prevent unwanted entry during test

item: Hatches to storage space under roof (particularly in cape-cod style houses)
comments: Close if possible, or else leave as is

item: Pet Door (Flap)
comments: Close if possible, or else leave as is

item: Letterbox / Slot
comments: Leave closed

item: Pull-down Attic Door
comments: Doors open, if attic is heated and a habitable space, otherwise closed

item: Wardrobe & Cupboard doors
comments: Leave closed

item: Fireplaces in the heated building area, room air dependent
comments: Ensure fire extinguished, remove ash

item: Fireplace in the heated building area (not room air dependent)
comments: Ensure fire extinguished, remove ash, close off supply air if possible

item: Ventilation for combustion air in the boiler room/fuel storage
comments: Close if possible, or else leave open

item: Opening of a ventilated cavity of a chimney in the heated building space
comments: Close if possible, or else leave open

item: Tiled stove/ built-in oven /auxiliary cooker - room air independent
comments: Ensure fire extinguished, remove ash. Doors/hatches closed

item: Tiled stove/ built-in oven /auxiliary cooker or similar - room air dependent
comments: Ensure fire extinguished, remove ash, close supply air if possible

item: Central vacuum cleaner system
comments: Turn off, close room sockets

item: Kitchen Extractor hood
comments: Stopped.

item: Laundry dryer in heated part of building with exhaust towards outside
comments: Close if possible, or else leave as is.

item: Cover plates of installation ducts with pumps/installation in heated space
comments: Leave as is

item: Empty conduits to unheated building areas (e.g. for later assembly of solar systems)
comments: Leave as is

item: Laundry chute to unheated part of building
comments: Close if possible, or else leave as is

item: Suspended ceiling
comments: Leave as is

item: Duct ventilation outlets in heated building area
comments: Normally once only at the machine - seal the inlet and outlet to outside. However, sometimes sealing on a room by room basis is a more viable option if the inlet/outlet of the unit are not accessible. A note in the test record is required in any case as to how the ventilation system was sealed

item: Earth-to-air heat exchanger (supply air ventilation system)
Fresh air openings (for mechanical extract air system)
comments: Close, no action

item: Supply/extract air outlets (supply/extractventilation system)
Ventilator on windows/skylights
comments: Close if possible, or else leave as is

item: Missing window handle
comments: Seal, note in test documentation

item: Roller shutter belt feed through
comments: Leave as is

item: Windows in unheated rooms
comments: Close
